page.title: 12Hill Walks.(Drove Roads)
page.content: Tarland to Glenkindie.-9 miles. Tarland -go N.W. by road to Easter Dovach, then East to Bog Farm.Strike up hill first N.E. then due N. by Humphrey's Well -along W. slope of Socach (old drove road to top of Craigie Hill.) Descend N.W. ridge to Chapleton and W. by road to Glenkindie.Maps. O.S. 39/37; B.52. To Cabrach -11 miles. Go N. up Kindie Burn by Glencuie and Rinmore to Largue where road ends.N.W. by LRT and path over W. slope of Glenlaff Hill to join a road 1 mile N. of summit,down the Kindie Burn to Powneed Farm from which a farm road goes to Cabrach.Maps O.S. 39/37.B.56. Additional Drove Roads. Glenbuchat to Cabrach. Glenbuchat to Glenlivet-(coffins were carried via this road for burial on either side.)
